author: cnbc.com
title: Wiz releases its 2017 fourth quarter results on Wednesday (28th)
text:
BRASILIA, Brazil, Feb. 28, 2018 /PRNewswire/ -- In this release, we registered gross revenues of R$149.6 million, an increase of 20.9%, compared to the same period in 2016. We concluded 2017 fiscal year with gross revenues of R$592.2, 31.3% above 2016. Net income reached R$163.4 million in 2017, a growth of 10.2% compared to the previous year.
The result was released today (28 th ) after the market had closed and tomorrow (1 st ) there will be the conference call (English and Portuguese) for analysts and investors.
All information about the release is available at the Company's web page.
About us
We are Wiz. Beyond an insurance brokerage company, we are a solution provider focused on identifying opportunities and implementing precise solutions to enhance businesses, by combining financial and insurance services with client's needs. Our core pillar is to provide the right service at the exact moment to create remarkable connections. We continue to heavily invest in people and technology to support our digital transformation.
